What is Arizona State University?

Arizona State University (ASU) is a public University founded in 1885 in the Urban City of Tempe. Since its inception, the University produced the world’s best experts, impacting economic growth. The University operates a semester-based academic calendar.

Arizona State University Address & Contact

The general address of Arizona State University is 1151 S Forest Ave, City of Tempe, AZ 85281, East of Phoenix, Arizona, United States. Call the 24/7 phone number (855) 278-5080 for ease and convenience.

Location by Campuses

Arizona State University has five (5) major campuses and minor campuses.

Downtown Phoenix campus

The Downtown Phoenix Campus is in the Arizona State University Center Building, Suite 130. The Street Address is 411 N Central Ave, Phoenix, AZ 85004, United States. Call the Downtown Phoenix Campus by Phone at 480-965-7788 and Fax at 480-965-3610. Walk into the office for any purpose in the hours of Monday — Friday, 8 a.m. – 5 p.m. The Downtown Phoenix Campus has departments for students preparing for careers in health care, law, government, nonprofit and public social service, arts and sciences, journalism, media, and the corporate sector.

Tempe campus

The Arizona State University(ASU), Tempe Campus is in the Student Services Building, Amphitheater START Desk, 1151 S Forest Ave #140, Tempe, AZ 85281, United States. Call the Tempe Campus on Phone number 480-965-7788 and Fax number 480-965-3610. Walk into the office for any purpose in the hours of Monday — Friday: 8 a.m. — 5 p.m.  The historic Tempe campus offers hundreds of majors that engage undergraduates and graduates in multidisciplinary research and exploration in first-rate laboratories and facilities. Sun Devil Stadium and ASU’s other Pac-12 athletic venues contribute to the spirit-filled energy on campus.

Polytechnic campus

The ASU Polytechnic is located in the Administration Building, Arizona State University. The Street address is 5990 S Sterling Mall, Mesa, Arizona 85212. Call the 24/7 Phone Number: 480-965-7788, and Fax: 480-965-3610. Also, walk into the ASU Polytechnic Campus office to find any information on the hours of Monday — Friday, 8 a.m. – 5 p.m. The ASU Polytechnic is home to students studying integrative sciences and arts, engineering, management, technology, and education.

ASU West Campus

The ASU’s West campus is in the University Center, Room 120, Arizona State University. The street address is 13590 N. 47th Ave. Phoenix, AZ 85306. Call the 24/7 Phone number: 480-965-7788, and Fax: 480-965-3610. Also, walk into ASU’s West Campus for information on Monday — Friday, 8 a.m. – 5 p.m. The ASU West Campus blends a liberal arts education with 21st-century leadership preparation in its 50 undergraduate and graduate degree programs. The beautiful architecture and courtyards on campus make it the perfect setting for students to enjoy the sun and study outside on the lawn.

ASU at Lake Havasu

ASU at Lake Havasu is located in Santiago Hall, Lake Havasu City, in western Arizona, near the California state line. The street address is 100 University Way, Lake Havasu City, AZ 86403. Call the 24/7 Phone number: 928-854-9745 and walk into the office on campus from Monday — Friday, 8 a.m. – 5 p.m.

Arizona State University Online | ASU Online Address

Offering more than 150 undergraduate and graduate degree programs, ASU Online is home to the nationally ranked online MBA and criminal justice programs. With six convenient start dates per year, your online education is waiting.

The ASU Online address is https://asuonline.asu.edu/, and the online call centre Phone number is 866-277-6589 8. Send an email to the online office on Email: enrollmentonline@asu.edu

Barrett, The Honors College at Arizona State University

Barrett, The Honors College at Arizona State University is a university honours program. The program maintains a presence at all of ASU’s Arizona campuses. Wikipedia

Address: 751 East Lemon Mall, Tempe, AZ 85281, United States

Arizona State University Mercado

Address: 502 E Monroe St, Phoenix, AZ 85004, United States

Arizona State University Business Administration C-Wing

Located in W. P. Carey School of Business – Arizona State University. The street Address is 400 E Lemon St, Tempe, AZ 85281, United States. Call the 24/7 Phone Number: +1 855-278-5080

University Services Building

Located at Arizona State University, the main campus. The street address is 1551 S Rural Rd, Tempe, AZ 85281, United States. Call the 24/7 Phone number at +1 480-965-1800

Memorial Union

Located at Arizona State University, the main campus. The street Address is 301 E Orange St., Tempe, AZ 85281, United States. Call the 24/7 Phone number at +1 480-965-5728

ASU School of Earth and Space Exploration

Located at Arizona State University, the main campus. The main street Address is 781 Terrace Mall, Tempe, AZ 85287, United States. Call the 24/7 Phone number at +1 480-965-5081

Health North Arizona State University

Located in Arizona State University’s Downtown Phoenix Campus. The street Address is 550 N 3rd St, Phoenix, AZ 85004, United States. Call the 24/7 Phone number at +1 855-278-5080

ASU Tempe campus – Registrar’s Office

Located at Arizona State University, the main campus. The street Address is Student Services Bldg, 1151 S Forest Ave #140, Tempe, AZ 85281, United States. Call the 24/7 Phone number at +1 480-965-3124

Admission Services mailing address

Have your test scores (e.g., ACT, SAT, TOEFL) and official high school or college transcripts sent from the issuing institution to the address below. Any written inquiries should be sent to this address as well.

Admission Services Applicant Processing
Arizona State University
PO Box 871004
Tempe AZ 85287-1004

If sending by FedEx, DHL, or UPS (Recommended method for international students):

Arizona State University
Admission Services Applicant Processing
1150 East University Drive Building C, Room 226
Tempe, AZ 85281
